dcterms:description: The Multi-Agent Particle World Environments (MPE) consist of various multi-agent games in a 2D world with small particles navigating within a square box, focusing on cooperative tasks.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent Particle World Environments (MPE)

dcterms:description: The StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC) involves decentralized agents cooperating to defeat adversarial bots in various scenarios with a wide range of agent numbers.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:description: Google Research Football (GRF) contains a set of cooperative multi-agent challenges in which a team of agents plays against scripted opponent players in various football scenarios.
dcterms:title: Google Research Football (GRF)

dcterms:description: The Hanabi Challenge is a turn-based card game where each agent observes other players' cards except their own, requiring cooperation to stack cards in ascending order.
dcterms:title: Hanabi Challenge
